text:
<!everyone> happy friday!
thanks again to <@U035FFGEHT2> and <@U035Q6N11A4> for their AMA earlier this week. if you missed it, <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C014P2BJLER/p1646244030544729|you can still see it here>. i'll be turning it into a blog post too. :slightly_smiling_face:
there were a number of other great threads this week too. a few of my favs:
• <@U0337RNB86A> turned a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C016ENU9KNU/p1645083616362579|conversation about books on editing> into a great blog post → <https://reproof.app/blog/library|A Proofreader's Library>
• <@U027BUUGUSW> is writing a post on the best freelancers to follow on twitter. <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C0242UCLXUY/p1646196956837129|see the list and add your name here>.
• <@U034Y7MH5SA> → <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1646252886741789|I'm curious how marketers here that may be involved in branded company podcasts measure ROI>. 
• <@U017WRJTKF1> started a <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1645202575146009|great thread about product-led content for enterprise companies>. know anyone doing this?
• <@U02D1E37FL5> asks <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C022W2V1Q0Y/p1645555618211929|"does anyone know of any hard numbers on the organic search disadvantages of not posting new content to a branded blog every week? Are there any? Is there a real organic search advantage to high frequency posting?">
• <@U019SM5LH6D> posted a great question about <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CUYDAGXKR/p1646408297939349|the best way to measure the business impact of content>
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Spekit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/250765-director-of-content-marketing-spekit|Director of Content Marketing> :zap:
• Resource Guru is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238749-senior-content-marketer-saasb2b-pound60-pound80k-resource-guru|Senior Content Marketer SaaS/B2B (£60-£80k) >:tv:️
• WEBRIS is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/244071-content-strategist-global-remote-webris|Content Strategist> :tv: ️
• Macrometa is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243864-content-marketing-manager-macrometa|Content Marketing Manager> ($100k)️
• Hubstaff is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/242962-content-manager-team-leader-hubstaff|Content Manager (Team Leader)> ($90-130k)
• Clever Real Estate is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/242882-content-team-lead-clever-real-estate|Content Team Lead> ($80-110k)
• Siege Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/241976-content-marketing-manager-remote-siege-media|Content Marketing Manager> ($73-83k)
• DigitalMarketer is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/240838-content-marketing-manager-digitalmarketer|Content Marketing Manager> ($60-85k)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-senior-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Senior Lead Content Marketer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJ7RT1J1X>)
• Invicti Security is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/236857-director-of-content-invicti-security|Director of Content>
• Mosaic is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235606-content-marketing-manager-mosaic|Content Marketing Manager> ($90-$120K)
• mParticle is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235092-content-marketing-manager-mparticle|Content Marketing Manager>
• Brightwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/233386-director-of-content-marketing-brightwheel|Director of Content Marketing> ($156k-$203k)
• Crelate️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232859-senior-content-marketing-manager-crelate|Senior Content Marketing Manager>
• Protocol Labs is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231602-editorial-content-lead-protocol-labs|Editorial Content Lead> ️
• O️penPhone is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/231924-head-of-content-openphone|Head of Content>
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225913-lead-content-marketer-remote-podia|Lead Content Marketer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJ7RT1J1X>)
• Ahrefs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225703-senior-content-marketer-martech-ahrefs|Senior Content Marketer (MarTech)> ️($40-100k)
• Orum is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/226110-content-marketing-lead-orum|Content Marketing Lead> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U02UJE525H7>)
• Kanopi Studios is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225005-content-designer-kanopi-studios|Content Designer>
• Avive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222645-content-and-communications-marketing-manager-avive|Content & Communications Marketing Manager> ($80-120k) :tv: (:wave: <@U013BG9P1UN>)
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• Exponent is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229409-freelance-content-writer-exponent|Freelance Content Writer>
• Stratabeat️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/226665-content-editor-stratabeat|Content Editor> ️
• WordAgents is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225011-freelance-content-writer-wordagents|Freelance Content Writer>
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• Rebuy is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/249483-content-marketer-rebuy-inc|Content Marketer> :zap:️
• Bolster is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/249374-director-of-marketing-bolster|Director of Marketing> :zap:️
• Isoline Communications Limited is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/245300-senior-content-marketing-manager-isoline-communications-limited|Senior Content Marketing Manager> (£38-39k)
• CopyAI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/244116-seo-marketing-manager-copyai|SEO Marketing Manager>️
• Relyance AI is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243492-technical-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Technical Marketing Content Developer> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/243493-privacy-marketing-content-developer-relyance-ai|Privacy Marketing Content Developer>
• Aimtal is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/241139-content-marketing-strategist-aimtal|Content Marketing Strategist>

• Rainforest QA is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/240345-content-marketing-manager-rainforest-qa|Content Marketing Manager>
• Modus Create is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/239848-content-strategisthead-of-content-modus-create|Content Strategist/Head of Content> ($60-80k)
• Different Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238900-content-marketing-manager-different-digital|Content Marketing Manager>
• Crayon is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/238763-content-marketing-senior-specialist-crayon|Content Marketing Senior Specialist>
• Literal Humans is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/235772-content-strategist-content-operations-literal-humans|Content Strategist> (Content Operations)
• Uscreen is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/234769-senior-seo-manager-uscreen|Senior SEO Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/234768-senior-content-strategist-uscreen|Senior Content Strategist> ️
• Hubspot is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/233833-senior-program-manager-marketing-hubspot|Senior Program Manager> (Marketing)
• NeuroFlow is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/236340-content-marketing-manager-neuroflow|Content Marketing Manager>
• Grata is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232635-content-marketing-manager-grata|Content Marketing Manager> ($90-120k)
• <http://Builder.io|Builder.io>️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/232219-senior-content-strategist-builderio|Senior Content Strategist>
• Foresight Insurance️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229337-content-marketing-manager-foresight-insurance|Content Marketing Manager> (<@UN29JC48H>)
• Assembled is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/227937-content-marketing-lead-assembled|Content Marketing Lead>
• CXL is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222945-content-lead-cxl|Content Lead> ($80-95k)
• A Network for Grateful Living is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/221652-content-strategist-a-network-for-grateful-living|Content Strategist> ️
• Mantra Health is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222955-content-marketing-manager-mantra-health|Content Marketing Manager>
have a great weekend everyone!
:v: jimmy
